p: The extract of this plant has been used in boar semen [ 63] incubated at 16 Â°C for 3 h. Ten extract concentrations were added to the semen extender, ranging from 0.2 to 2 mg/mL. As a result, this plant impaired sperm function starting from the lowest concentration and showed spermicidal effects from 0.4 mg/mL.
